column3: Metropolitan Pit Stop is a great little museum! And a gift shop. And parts & service, since 1975.A Hidden Gem!

If you find yourself in the area of North Hollywood and are looking for something to do, check out the Metropolitan Pit Stop. It is a small museum and parts store for the now defunct Metropolitan automobile, with several examples of this unique small car.Well worth a stop!

column2: A must see for fans of Nash Metropolitan Autos
column3: A small but amazing collection of Nash Metropolitan cars and it's also a parts and repair facility with a vast collection of new and used parts.
